title: Christmas Classics: O' Christmas Tree
description: Featuring the voices of Edward Asner, Tim Conway and Marie Osmond, this tale is set in a snowy forest on Christmas Eve where a forlorn pine tree feels she is too homely to ever realize her dream of becoming a real Christmas tree.
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Bert Ring"], "Producers": ["Mark McGroarty"], "Starring": ["Marie Osmond", "Edward Asner", "Tim Conway"]}
